name: webmo
description: A tiny library to capture device motion, rotation, and orientation events.

scripts.start: npm run build:browser && cp dist/webmo.js example/ && http-server example/
scripts.build:browser: npm run build:tsc && browserify -s webmo -e src/index.js -o dist/webmo.js && uglifyjs -cm -o dist/webmo.min.js dist/webmo.js
scripts.gzip:size: npm run build:browser && gzip -c dist/webmo.min.js | wc -c

author: Evan Shortiss <evanshortiss@gmail.com>

hooks.pre-commit: npm run format && git add src/
